Translations.Text: M
knyha, bez sumnivu, vidkryttya z Lorda vsesvitu
Vony skazaly, "Vin vyhotovyv tse." Diysno, tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu z vashoho Lorda, shchob poperedyty lyudey kotri nikoly otrymani warner pered tym, yak vy, shcho vony ne mozhutʹ keruvatysya

BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy u shesty dnyakh, todi prypustylo vesʹ avtorytet. Vy nikhto ne mayete bilya Yoho tomu shcho Lord, ne robyte vy mayete poserednyka. Chy ne mohly b vy ne vzyaty uvahu
Vsi materialy kontrolyuyutʹsya Yo z nebes do zemli. Yomu, denʹ ekvivalent do odniyeyi tysyachi vashykh rokiv
Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy; Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto perfected vse Vin stvoryuvav, ta pochav stvorennya lyudsʹke z hlyny
Todi Vin prodovzhyv yoho vidtvorennya cherez pevne nyzʹko ridke
Vin formlenyy yo ta poduv u yoho z Yoho dukh. Ta Vin dav vam slukhannya, zir, ta mizky; ridko vy vdyachni
Vony dyvuyutʹsya, "Pislya my znykayemo u zemlyu, my pryyizhdzhayemo utvoreni shche raz?" Otzhe, shchodo zustrichayuchoho yikhnʹoho Lorda, vony disbelievers
Kazhete, "Vy budete stavytysya do smerti anhelom u chyyim vydatku vy rozmishchuyetesʹ, todi do vashoho Lorda vy budete vertatysya

Yakby tilʹky vy mohly pobachyty vynuvati koly vony klanyayutʹsya vnyz yikhni holovy pered tym, yak yikhniy Lord: "Nash Lord, zaraz my pobachyly ta my pochuly. Poshlitʹ nam nazad ta my budemo spravedlyvi. Zaraz my dosyahnuly certainty
Maly my willed, my mohly daly kozhnu dushu yoho kerivnytstvo, ale tse vzhe predetermined shcho ya zapovnyu Peklo z jinns ta humans, vesʹ razom
Kushtuyutʹ naslidky vashoho zabuvayuchoho tsʹoho dnya; zaraz my zabuvayemo vas. Vy zaznaly vichnoho retribution v obmin na vashi vlasni pratsi
Yedyni lyudy shcho spravdi viryatʹ v nashym vidkryttyam ye tsey khto padayutʹ prostrate na chuyuchykh yim. Vony glorify ta khvalyatʹ yikhnʹoho Lorda, bez budʹ-yakoyi zukhvalosti
Yikhni storony lehko forsake yikhni krovati, aby obozhnyuvaty yikhnʹoho Lorda, z povahy ta spodivannya, ta z nashykh umov yim, vony dayutʹ
Vy ne mayete ideyi skilʹky radosti ta shchastya chekayete vas yak vynahoroda dlya vashoho (spravedlyva) pratsi
odyn khto viruyuchyy toy zhe tomu shcho odyn khto ye bezputnyy? Vony ye ne rivni
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, vony zasluzhyly vichnyy Ray. Takyy yikhniy abode, v obmin na yikhni pratsi

Yak dlya bezputnoyi, yikhnʹoyi doli Peklo. Kozhnyy chas vony probuyutʹ lyshyty tse, vony budutʹ prymushuvatysya nazad. Vony budutʹ rozpovidatysya, "Kushtuyutʹ ahoniyu Pekla kotryy vy vykorystaly disbelieve
My dozvolyayemo yim kushtuyemo bilʹsh malyy retribution (tsʹoho svitu), pered tym, yak vony zaznayutʹ bilʹshoho retribution (U maybutnʹomu), shcho vony mozhutʹ (berutʹ natyak ta) reforma
Khto bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh odyn khto nahaduyetʹsya pro tsi vidkryttya yoho Lorda, todi napolyahaye na disregarding yim? My zvychayno pokarayemo vynuvatyy
My daly Moses svyate pysannya - ne havanʹ budʹ-yakyy sumniv pro zbory Yo - ta my vstyhly dovidnyk dlya Ditey Izrayilya
My pryznachyly z chysla yim imams kotri kerovanyy u vidpovidnosti do nashykh zapovidey, tomu, shcho vony steadfastly persevered ta dosyahnuly certainty pro nashi vidkryttya
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto bude sudyty yikh na Dni Resurrection, vidnosno vse vony posperechalysya
tse kolysʹ traplyayetʹsya yim skilʹky heneratsiy my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim? Vony zaraz zhyvutʹ ta zakhodyatʹ yikhni domivky predkiv. Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty dostatni dokazy. Vony ne chuyutʹ
vony ne zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho my vedemo vodu do bezplidnykh zemelʹ, ta produktsiyi z tse zerno do zhyvlennya yikhnya domashna khudoba, tak zhe, yak i sebe? Vony ne dyvlyatʹsya
Vony vyklyk: "De shcho peremoha, yakshcho vy pravdyvi
Kazhutʹ, denʹ taka peremoha prybuvaye, viryachy ne bude vyhoda tsey khto ne vvazhav pered shcho, ne bude vony podanyy inshyy shans
Tomu, disregard yim ta chekayutʹ, vony nadto chekayutʹ
